text: Atahpara musa (ah) yakhana se'i meyada purna karala ebam saparibare yatra karala, takhana se tura parbatera dika theke aguna dekhate pela. Se tara paribarabargake balala, tomara apeksa kara, ami aguna dekhechi. Sambhabatah ami sekhana theke tomadera kache kona khabara niye asate pari athaba kona jbalanta kasthakhanda anate pari, yate tomara aguna pohate para.
